ai-patthana15.36:0.2_0: The Origin of the Dhamma: allows uninterruptedly in the case of the phenomena, in the various forms -
ai-patthana15.36:0.3_0: Transmigration is supremely acquisition, covetousness and calmness.
ai-patthana15.36:1.1_0: Valuing defilements give rise to skillful qualities. Someone who is skilled in loss of skillful qualities is not skilled in reasons. Their dealings are not skilled in defilement, and because of the causes and reasons.
ai-patthana15.36:2.1_0: (They are) unconnected with pollutants. Skilled in definitiveness, and not for one reason.
ai-patthana15.36:2.1_2: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.36:3.1_0: Visiting the teaching of freedom from an unprofitable principle, without unskillful qualities, or with a reason.
ai-patthana15.36:4.1_0: One who has no reasons. Since they’re incompetent, flawless, and undirected regarding the teaching.
ai-patthana15.36:4.1_1: (They are) unfamiliar with pride, or lacking good qualities. When conditions are fulfilled, there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.36:4.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.36:5.1_0: The group of nine is finished.
